name: next-story
description: Playground app to figure out how to integrate the chosen tech stack.
author: Daniel Dogeanu <contact@danieldogeanu.com> (https://danieldogeanu.com/)

scripts.copy-types: cd backend && npm run types && cd .. && node scripts/copy-strapi-types.js
scripts.compose-dev:build: npm run copy-data && docker compose --profile development build --no-cache
scripts.compose-sb:build: npm run copy-data && docker compose --profile storybook build --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:build: npm run copy-data && docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile all build --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:build:backend: npm run copy-data && docker compose -f compose.prod.yml --profile backend build --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:build:frontend: npm run copy-data && docker compose -f compose.prod.yml build ns_nextjs_prod --no-cache
scripts.compose-prod:recreate:fetcher: docker compose -f compose.prod.yml up ns_fetcher_prod --force-recreate --renew-anon-volumes && npm run copy-data
